article_title: A Surfeit of IT Chiefs Brings Execution Challenges
article_text: Technology’s increased role in business has led to firms adding new IT-management roles, many with overlapping areas of focus and turf. “The resulting lack of collaboration can set back an organization for years,” CIO Journal Columnist Thomas H. Davenport writes. “Now might be a good time for a moratorium on new CxO titles until we figure out how they all relate to each other.”

article_summary:
Technology’s increased role in business has led to firms adding new IT-management roles, many with overlapping areas of focus and turf.
“The resulting lack of collaboration can set back an organization for years,” CIO Journal Columnist Thomas H. Davenport writes.
“Now might be a good time for a moratorium on new CxO titles until we figure out how they all relate to each other.”
